name: P1999 --P1999 skin  fix
description: This is just a very small fix for the --P1999 skin (not the default blue skin).  It changes the small subheading text to a visible gray.  Only putting this up so people don't need to hassle with creating it themselves.

user.name: ir0nfist
user.about: I sometimes put up fixes for annoyances I find in websites I use.  Just so others don't have to take the time to do it.  That's about it.
